relation: Very good classes and priced right
Believe in your self and work hard!
The beginning of my new life started here. I am very proud to say I am enrolled here. The professors are amazing.
pageTitle: Victor Valley College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {204042=Find out what you want to major in, quick. They say it's not necessary to declare a major right away, and that is half right, but the sooner you know, the sooner you can move on to a university. There's no such thing as finishing up general ed before I go to a university, and then finding out what my major should be. Also, this college's accreditation is currently under question by the the state college board (April 2013), so beware., 168488=Pretty popular weight training facilities that I disovered during my first Weights class. Considering the fairly low tuition, academic bang for buck is good, but don't expect a cosmopolitan, big-city campus with those kind of amenities (like art gallery & museum). Library (aka learning resource center) is attractive & modern, with plants & murals to make it pleasant; there's plenty of one-person carrels and several small study rooms that always seem to be occupied. Parking permits now $40/semester, $20 for summer session (as of 2013), with daily parking passes available for those infrequent visitors. As of summer 2012, tuition is $46/credit hour for in-state students, with a reasonably moderate enrollment fee assessed on out-of-state students., 305449=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 275884=This is my first year at Victor Valley college, the 2014 spring semester jus started and so far I am enjoying my time here. Everyone is helpful and understanding., 165568=Police station on lower campus, but I rarely if ever see them circulating. One shooting suicide Fall 2012, but no one else was hurt according to press. Generally feel safe attending evening events here. Parking lots well lit, with visible emergency call stations scattered throughout., 63520=i have been attending victor valley college since the fall of 2007. i have to say that my experience thus far has been nothing but positive. the instructors really push for excellence, which i appreciate.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Jane from Apple Valley, CA 02/12/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 77 Categories Comments Campus Safety i see campus safety all the time while i am on campus. they are always offering a smile. i find that their presence offers a personal safety when i am standing by myself waiting for a ride or walking in a parking lot alone Greek Life none Clubs and Activities vvc offers a lot of clubs and sports. if you can think of it vvc has it. clubs are student run so the hard part is finding the club. Great for these types of students vvc is great for students looking for a trade or certificates and for deciding on a future college to trnsfer to or even staying and graduating from vvc. there are many
